UPDATE cb_merchant
pro_org_code = #{proOrgCode},
city_org_code = #{cityOrgCode},
county_org_code = #{countyOrgCode},
merchant_name = #{merchantName},
merchant_fullname = #{merchantFullname},
logo = #{logo},
address = #{address},
phone = #{phone},
area_id = #{areaId},
merchant_status = #{merchantStatus},
is_enable = #{isEnable},
disable_status = #{disableStatus},
is_top = #{isTop},
introduce = #{introduce},
license = #{license},
tax_reg = #{taxReg},
contract_begintime = #{contractBegintime},
contract_endtime = #{contractEndtime},
contract_staff = #{contractStaff},
audit_start_org_code = #{auditStartOrgCode},
audit_end_org_code = #{auditEndOrgCode},
audit_state = #{auditState},
audit_org_code = #{auditOrgCode},
audit_stage = #{auditStage},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
audit_comment = #{auditComment},
audit_staff = #{auditStaff},
review_staff = #{reviewStaff},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contact_email = #{contactEmail},
legal_name = #{legalName},
legal_credent_type = #{legalCredentType},
legal_credent_no = #{legalCredentNo},
complaint_phone = #{complaintPhone},
user_org_code = #{userOrgCode},
company_credential = #{companyCredential},
edit_audit_state = #{editAuditState},
operate_time = #{operateTime},
operate_user = #{operateUser},
is_outsource = #{isOutsource},
company_id = #{companyId},
AND id = #{id}
AND merchant_id = #{merchantId}

UPDATE cb_merchant
pro_org_code = #{proOrgCode},
city_org_code = #{cityOrgCode},
county_org_code = #{countyOrgCode},
org_code = #{orgCode},
contact_name = #{contactName},
legal_name = #{legalName},
legal_credent_type = #{legalCredentType},
legal_credent_no = #{legalCredentNo},
merchant_name = #{merchantName},
merchant_fullname = #{merchantFullname},
phone = #{phone},
license = #{license},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contract_staff = #{contractStaff},
edit_audit_state = #{editAuditState},
is_outsource = #{isOutsource},
company_id = #{companyId},
where merchant_id = #{merchantId}
mapper.select: SELECT cm.create_time,cm.client_id,cm.merchant_id,cm.pro_org_code,cm.city_org_code,cm.county_org_code,cm.org_code,cm.merchant_name,cm.merchant_fullname,cm.logo,cm.address,cm.phone,cm.area_id,cm.merchant_status,cm.is_enable,cm.disable_status,cm.is_top,cm.introduce,cm.license,cm.tax_reg,cm.contract_begintime,cm.contract_endtime,cm.contract_staff,cm.audit_start_org_code,cm.audit_end_org_code,cm.audit_state,cm.audit_org_code,cm.audit_stage,cm.audit_time,cm.audit_comment,cm.audit_staff,cm.review_staff,cm.contact_name,cm.contact_phone,cm.contact_email,cm.legal_name,cm.legal_credent_type,cm.legal_credent_no,cm.complaint_phone,cm.user_org_code,cm.company_credential,cm.edit_audit_state,cm.operate_time,cm.operate_user,cm.is_outsource,cm.company_id FROM cb_merchant cm WHERE cm.id = #{id}

SELECT cm.create_time,cm.client_id,cm.merchant_id,cm.pro_org_code,cm.city_org_code,cm.county_org_code,cm.org_code,cm.merchant_name,cm.merchant_fullname,cm.logo,cm.address,cm.phone,cm.area_id,cm.merchant_status,cm.is_enable,cm.disable_status,cm.is_top,cm.introduce,cm.license,cm.tax_reg,cm.contract_begintime,cm.contract_endtime,cm.contract_staff,cm.audit_start_org_code,cm.audit_end_org_code,cm.audit_state,cm.audit_org_code,cm.audit_stage,cm.audit_time,cm.audit_comment,cm.audit_staff,cm.review_staff,cm.contact_name,cm.contact_phone,cm.contact_email,cm.legal_name,cm.legal_credent_type,cm.legal_credent_no,cm.complaint_phone,cm.user_org_code,cm.company_credential,cm.edit_audit_state,cm.operate_time,cm.operate_user,cm.is_outsource,cm.company_id FROM cb_merchant cm WHERE cm.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
